text:
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
September 26, 1958
PHONE WO 8-6118
SEP 2 7 1958
Dr. Harry J. Skornia *
Executive Director
Nat'l. Ass'n. of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I think that I "will come to the NAEB Convention for one day.
I have an appointment in Chicago for the evening of the 13th
and. -will catch a night train getting in Omaha at 8:00 o'clock
on the morning of the 14th. I -will leave there that nighty
soon after midnight, back to Chicago. I -would like to have
a room for the l4th and -would hope it could be available to
me that morning when I arrive. It would be nice if you and
Frank and Hall and I, with any others whom you might suggest,
could have dinner together, but I realize that this might
not be at all convenient.
Sincerely and with best wishes.
Maurice F. Seay
MFS/fh
cc - Frank Schooley
